summary: Shrine and blessing for Hircine - The Daedric Prince of The Hunt, Father of the Manbeasts.
descriptionHtml:
NOTE: I\'ve lost the original source files and scripts for this mod and can no longer support or develop it.
===========================================================================================

I\'ve added a Shrine and blessing for Hircine - The Daedric Prince of The Hunt, Father of the Manbeasts.

It can be found in The Rift, not far from Rift Watchtower.
The location will be added to your map automatically but is grey\'ed out and must be discovered.

Blessing for Hircine adds 10% damage to bows for 7 hours.

=========

UPDATE HISTORY:
Due to popular demand I have lowered the over-powered Blessing effect from 50% to 10%.
10% is closer to the power of the base-game blessings (eg. Blessing of Stendarr = Block +10%) rather than the Elixir of True Shot i was using as reference.

Still don\'t like the stats? I have added a discussion detailing the process to change them.

=========

FOR MODDERS:
Download \"Blessing of Hircine - Objects Only\" to put shines anywhere you want and use them in your mod. I\'ve made a test cell to check it\'s all working: use console \"coc hircineBlessingTest\"
(Just PM me to say Hi, Endorse, and link to this page if you use it in your mod.)
author: Hoax2
